Suez | Egypt | Red Sea | Friday Street | London

OF all the spots on the worldâ€™s surface that I, George Walker, of Friday Street, London, have ever visited, Suez in Egypt, at the head of the Red Sea, is by far the vilest, the most unpleasant, and the least interesting.
